definition: a pad placed under a carpet, provide with a base, support, lining, or backing
details:
noun
- a pad placed under a carpet
= synonyms: carpet pad
verb
- provide with a base, support, lining, or backing
= example: provide with a base, support, lining, or backing
- put (something) under or beneath
- raise or support (the level of printing) by inserting a piece of paper or cardboard under the type
= example: raise or support (the level of printing) by inserting a piece of paper or cardboard under the type
